custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM SharingEntry WHERE SharingEntry.sharingEntryId IN ( SELECT min(SharingEntry.sharingEntryId) FROM SharingEntry WHERE SharingEntry.toUserId = ? GROUP BY SharingEntry.classNameId, SharingEntry.classPK )

SELECT {SharingEntry.*} FROM SharingEntry WHERE SharingEntry.sharingEntryId IN ( SELECT min(SharingEntry.sharingEntryId) FROM SharingEntry WHERE SharingEntry.toUserId = ? GROUP BY SharingEntry.classNameId, SharingEntry.classPK ) ORDER BY SharingEntry.modifiedDate DESC
